ConversationSessionManager - Class in com.oracle.view.source
Comprehensive Conversation Session Manager Manages user conversation sessions with proper state tracking: - Session creation and management - Conversation state tracking - Follow-up detection and handling - Multi-turn conversation chains - Timeout and cleanup
ConversationSessionManager.ConversationResult - Class in com.oracle.view.source
Conversation Result - represents the result of processing user input
ConversationSessionManager.ConversationState - Class in com.oracle.view.source
Conversation State - represents the current state of a conversation
ConversationSessionManager.UserSession - Class in com.oracle.view.source
User Session - represents a user's active session
